caption:
Building a global team is about more than just work.
It’s about shared moments, inside jokes… and bubble tea. 🧋

While our Taiwan team was in Paris, they brought local snacks for the rest of the crew — a small gesture that meant a lot.
Because sometimes, creating strong collaboration across borders starts with something as simple as a sweet treat.

We’re not just building an AI solution.
We’re building a team that cares, connects, and grows — together.

Merci à notre équipe d’Asie pour ce moment de partage 🙌
And yes… bubble tea diplomacy is officially a thing.
